casebody.data:
Stanley Johnson ZUFALL, Appellee, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellant. No. 7516. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Jan. 23, 1941. Thomas E. Walsh, of Washington, D. C.,. for appellant. Edward J. McGinness, of McKeesport,. Pa., for appellee.

Before MARIS, JONES, and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed for the reasons set forth in the opinion of Judge McVicar, 36 F.Supp. 999..
